snippet: The skeleton is thought to be around two million years old and it is not certain whether the species was a direct ancestor of humans’ genus, Homo, or simply a close relative.
lead_paragraph: The skeleton is thought to be around two million years old and it is not certain whether the species was a direct ancestor of humans’ genus, Homo, or simply a close relative.

headline.main: South Africa: Nearly Complete Skeleton of Human Ancestor Found
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Nearly Complete Skeleton of Human Ancestor Found
